Guilds are a great way to connect to a community and make new friends. Each guild has its own chat channel and list of members showing who's available to play with. Members can cooperate to obtain a guild hall and purchase upgrades such as leveling bonuses, shared item vaults, and the ability to throw a party. 

You can join a guild or start your own!
